meanings.definition: Not of a specific year or vintage.
meanings.sent1: The store sold nonvintages wines that were not from a particular year.
meanings.sent2: She preferred nonvintages clothing because they never went out of style.
meanings.sent3: The nonvintages cupcakes were a hit at the party, as they were timeless and delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her nonvintages taste in music always surprises her friends.
meanings.sent5: The nonvintages furniture in the room gave it a classic and elegant look.

meanings.definition: Items that are not from a particular year or vintage.
meanings.sent1: The wine shop had a special section for nonvintages from various regions.
meanings.sent2: Collectors often seek out nonvintages to add unique pieces to their collection.
meanings.sent3: The museum displayed a collection of nonvintages art pieces that spanned different eras.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe was filled with nonvintages that she had collected over the years.
meanings.sent5: The antique shop had a variety of nonvintages items that caught the eye of many visitors.
